plot: Danny, Martin, and Mike are all young boys sharing a hospital room the day before their surgeries. Danny has been through the most surgeries; he's slow to open up, but initially we think he's having a kidney replaced. The boys bond.
title: The Night Before
plot_es: Danny, Martin, and Mike are all young boys sharing a hospital room the day before their surgeries. Danny has been through the most surgeries; he's slow to open up, but initially we think he's having a kidney replaced. The boys bond.
plot_en: Danny, Martin, and Mike are all young boys sharing a hospital room the day before their surgeries. Danny has been through the most surgeries; he's slow to open up, but initially we think he's having a kidney replaced. The boys bond.
